title: The Three Princesses
description: In a land of once upon a time, a king and queen have three beautiful daughters. Following the advice of the wise Wood Faerie, Adela, the king and queen have decided that before their three daughters will be allowed to take a place on the Royal Council, they must prove their worthiness. Each girl must journey into a mysterious forest where magic lives. In this forest they will meet Adela. Ever since the girls were born she has been watching them and learning about each girl's individual gifts. The Wood Faerie has been planning three quests for each girl to show that they are worthy to become queens. Will the princesses pass the tests?https://www.createspace.com/3867670
author: Joy LeAnne Lightfoot
